On 18 April 2010 00:11, Jeff Clune <jclune@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Colin-
>
> There have been a few papers that have done things along these lines.
>

Heh, very thorough and prompt response. Excellent, thankyou.

Actually, reading Ken's hyperneat page made me realise I'd forgotten
all about handling node bias - if you've got millions of nodes do you
really want millions of bias connections. Makes me wonder if I should
modify the NEAT genome to represent node bias directly on each node
gene  and thus lose the bias node.

Cheers,

Colin.
